| tstats values(source) AS source WHERE `set_cribl_internal_log_index` source IN ("*state/jobs/*") host=$host$ | mvexpand source | rex field=source "state\/jobs\/(?<WorkerGroup>.*?)\/(?<JobId>.*?)\/" | rex field=JobId "^.*\d+\.\d+\.(scheduled|adhoc|system)\.(?<JobName>.*)" | search WorkerGroup=$worker_group$ JobName=$jobName$ | stats values(JobId) as JobId | mvexpand JobId | sort 0 - JobId

div.p: This is intended as a general use dashboard to help you troubleshoot any issues you may be having with jobs. You can use the dropdown to filter logs based on Worker Group, job name, and job ID. Improvements to our job logging will be made in future releases which will result in more useful job metrics. For now, we are providing you with just a list of logs.
